column3: My new book on reject cull dogs how to live rich on any budget is tentatively titled, Live Better than a Billionaire on Five Dollars Extra a Day.  You are invited to read my blog about the book at http://livebetterthanabillionaireon5dollars.blogspot.com/.  you will lead a happy life
So many good books so many wonderful things so few hours.  For as long as I can remember I have  loved reading , writing and felt antipathy toward arithmetic.
Acting on your heart's instructions means abandoning all those careful strategies for avoiding rejection and bolting toward the fertile, gorgeous jungle of human imagination and possibility
